display.name: XX Monthly Tablespace Growth
display.description: This script belongs under OEM (Cloud Control group)

query.sql: SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(a_size.month_timestamp,'MON RR'),'MON RR') AS CALENDAR_MONTH, round(avg(a_size.size_gb),2) AS SIZE_GB, round(avg(used.used_gb),2) AS USED_GB, round(avg(a_size.size_gb - used.used_gb),2) AS FREE_GB, round(avg((used.used_gb*100)/ decode(a_size.size_gb,0,1,a_size.size_gb)) ,2) AS USED_PCT FROM (SELECT m.rollup_timestamp AS month_timestamp, sum(m.average/1024) AS size_gb FROM mgmt$metric_daily m, mgmt$target_type t WHERE t.target_guid=HEXTORAW(??EMIP_BIND_TARGET_GUID??) AND (t.target_type='rac_database' OR (t.target_type='oracle_database' AND t.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST')) AND m.target_guid=t.target_guid AND m.metric_guid=t.metric_guid AND t.metric_name='tbspAllocation' AND (t.metric_column='spaceAllocated') AND m.rollup_timestamp >= ??EMIP_BIND_START_DATE?? AND m.rollup_timestamp <= ??EMIP_BIND_END_DATE?? GROUP BY m.metric_column, m.rollup_timestamp) a_size, (SELECT m.rollup_timestamp AS month_timestamp, sum(m.average/1024) AS used_gb FROM mgmt$metric_daily m, mgmt$target_type t WHERE t.target_guid=HEXTORAW(??EMIP_BIND_TARGET_GUID??) AND (t.target_type='rac_database' OR (t.target_type='oracle_database' AND t.TYPE_QUALIFIER3 != 'RACINST')) AND m.target_guid=t.target_guid AND m.metric_guid=t.metric_guid AND t.metric_name='tbspAllocation' AND (t.metric_column='spaceUsed') AND m.rollup_timestamp >= ??EMIP_BIND_START_DATE?? AND m.rollup_timestamp <= ??EMIP_BIND_END_DATE?? GROUP BY m.metric_column, m.rollup_timestamp) used WHERE a_size.month_timestamp =used.month_timestamp GROUP BY TO_CHAR(a_size.month_timestamp,'MON RR') ORDER BY TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(a_size.month_timestamp,'MON RR'),'MON RR')

display.name: AWR On Demand
display.tooltip: Each snap is 15 minutes - 4 snaps is 60 minutes

query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select INSTANCE_NUMBER INST_ID , SNAP_ID , DBID , to_char(BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') BEGIN_INTERVAL , to_char(END_INTERVAL_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM') END_INTERVAL --, BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME BEGIN_INTERVAL --, END_INTERVAL_TIME END_INTERVAL --, FLUSH_ELAPSED --, SNAP_LEVEL --, ERROR_COUNT --, SNAP_FLAG --, SNAP_TIMEZONE --, CON_ID , STARTUP_TIME --, :SQL_ID SQL_ID from dba_hist_snapshot where --BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME between (sysdate - 36/24) and (sysdate) BEGIN_INTERVAL_TIME between trunc(sysdate-2) and (sysdate) order by SNAP_ID desc , INSTANCE_NUMBER

display.name: AWR
display.description: Choose End Interval Time. The AWR report is generated for 3 hour period
display.tooltip: Select the END INTERVAL - SNAP ID

query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date : 2015/08/27 (of last update/validation) --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select output from table(dbms_workload_repository.AWR_SQL_REPORT_TEXT(:DBID, :INST_ID, :SNAP_ID-4, :SNAP_ID, :SQL_ID ))

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) --WRM$_SNAPSHOT_DETAILS Table is Not Purged (Doc ID 1489801.1) SELECT MIN(snap_id) "MIN_SNAP" , max(snap_id) "MAX_SNAP" , cast(min(begin_time) as date) "Min Begin Time" , CAST(MAX(begin_time) AS DATE) "Max Begin Time" , COUNT(*) FROM sys.wrm$_snapshot_details a WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.wrm$_snapshot b WHERE b.snap_id = a.snap_id AND a.dbid = b.dbid AND a.instance_number = b.instance_number )

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select ' begin DBMS_WORKLOAD_REPOSITORY.DROP_SNAPSHOT_RANGE(low_snap_id => '||:MIN_SNAP||', high_snap_id => '||(:MIN_SNAP+100)||'); end; /'||chr(13)||chr(10) "DROP SNAPSHOT RANGE" from dual
